name: ui-sketcher
description: Turn UI sketches into code with the magic of GPT-4 Vision

commands.title: UI Sketcher: Set OpenAI API Token

ui-sketcher.stack.description: List of packages used in the project which should be taken into account when generating code

ui-sketcher.customInstructions.description: Custom instructions to include when generating code

ui-sketcher.maxTokens.description: Maximum number of tokens to generate

ui-sketcher.previewUrl.description:
Please read the doc: https://github.com/pAIrprogio/vscode-ui-sketcher/blob/main/doc/setup-preview-url.md

A url which should be able to take a relative file's path as a query param and display the file's component as a result. For example http://localhost/test-ui should work with  http://localhost/test-ui?path=path/to/file.tsx

ui-sketcher.partialRenderEnabled.description:
If enabled, when clicking on "Make Real" the extension will only generate code for the active selection.

If there isn't an active selection, the whole canvas will be used.

scripts.pretest: pnpm run compile-tests && pnpm run compile && pnpm run lint
